title: why is the word incest censored?
body: in chat it is but I've seen a person, won't say the full name, with the name incest, is that against the rules? to have "incest" in your name? Sure some people might think "Ew gross" but I don't see why the hell it is censored still.

replies.body:
My best guess is because you can use it in a way that can insult people and to prevent a potential problem, they censor it ahead of time?

Anyone have any other guesses?

> [{quoted}](name=YerroFever,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ZGXWjdOv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-03T23:43:09.458+0000)
>
> My best guess is because you can use it in a way that can insult people and to prevent a potential problem, they censor it ahead of time?
> 
> Anyone have any other guesses?

there is also a high elo person called princess incest I found them on op.gg checking out adcs and they were one of the top so I guess it's ok to have that name?
You didn't really read OPs post, did you?

you're right, apologies i completely misunderstood :(
stopped halfway there at ''but i dont see why the hell it is censored still''
